metadata.title: CVE-2024-23672 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Denial of Service via incomplete cleanup vulnerability in Apache Tomcat. Itwas possible for WebSocket clients to keep WebSocket connections openleading to increased resource consumption.This issue affects Apache Tomcat:from 11.0.0-M1 through 11.0.0-M16, from 10.1.0-M1 through 10.1.18, from9.0.0-M1 through 9.0.85, from 8.5.0 through 8.5.98. Users are recommendedto upgrade to version 11.0.0-M17, 10.1.19, 9.0.86 or 8.5.99 which fix theissue.

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat8 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat9 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
